life.threedee

Class TexturedPlane

  • java.lang.Object
    • life.threedee.Plane
      • life.threedee.TexturedPlane
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ThreeDeeObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GhostPlane

    public class TexturedPlane
extends Plane
    A plane that has a texture on it, does not extend past it's texture. The origin point given is the bottom left corner of the image

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int h
      The height of the image in pixels
      Vector right
      Represents right with regards to this plane, must be recalculated if the plane is rotated
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage texture
      The texture for this textured plane
      Vector up
      Represents up with regards to this plane, must be recalculated if the plane is rotated
      int w
      The width of the image in pixels

      • Fields inherited from class life.threedee.Plane

        c, normal, origin

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TexturedPlane(Point p, Vector n, java.awt.image.BufferedImage texture)
      Note: p is the bottom left corner of the texture, so keep that in mind.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.awt.Color c(Point inter)
      Calculates the pixel at a given point of intersection, null if it is outside the image
      TColorTransfer getRData(Vector vector, Point point, double minT)
      Returns the t value (see calculateT), color, and this for the given direction, point, and minimum t value.
      boolean sameSide(Point point1, Point point2)
      Returns whether or not the two points are on the same side of the object

      • getRData

        public TColorTransfer getRData(Vector vector,
                      Point point,
                      double minT)
        Description copied from interface: ThreeDeeObject
        Returns the t value (see calculateT), color, and this for the given direction, point, and minimum t value. The minT is passed so as to avoid calculating color if it will not be used anyways.
        Specified by:
        getRData in interface ThreeDeeObject
